T02D2839:180b-0: @180b * // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2839:180b-1: sgrub po gang zhig 'chi ba dang //
T02D2839:180b-2: 'chi ba ma yin ltas gang dag / gang tshe mngon du gyur pa na //
T02D2839:180b-3: mgon po'i slu ba 'dir bshad do //
T02D2839:180b-4: 'jig rten g-yeng ba ma lus las //
T02D2839:180b-5: rnam dben dal ba bsgrubs nas ni //
T02D2839:180b-6: mchog gsum skyabs 'gro nas brtsams te //
T02D2839:180b-7: ci rigs chos spyod brtsam par bya //
T02D2839:180b-8: longs spyod bshes dang lus nyid dang //
T02D2839:180b-9: byang chub phyogs kyi mngon par zhe na //
T02D2839:180b-10: rnam bcu rnam gsum spangs nas ni //
T02D2839:180b-11: ltos pa thams cad rnam par dor //
T02D2839:180b-12: mi rtag sdug bsngal bdag med dang //
T02D2839:180b-13: stong pa nyid kyi rnam thar gyis //
T02D2839:180b-14: 'khor ba'i gnas la yid phyung zhing //
T02D2839:180b-15: mya ngan 'das la mngon par dga' //
T02D2839:180b-16: de nas bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson par bya ste /
T02D2839:180b-17: kha lho phyogs su bltas la /
T02D2839:180b-18: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yid la byed
T02D2839:180b-19: pa dang ma bral bas mig gi 'dzums par mdun
T02D2839:180b-20: gyi nam mkha' la rgyal ba lha nyi shu rtsa
T02D2839:180b-21: lnga'i dkyil 'khor mngon par gsal bar bya'o //
T02D2839:180b-22: gal te spros par nus na ni sku gsung thugs
T02D2839:180b-23: ye shes phrin las mdzad pa dam tshig rnam pa
T02D2839:180b-24: bdun gyi dkyil 'khor bdag nyid kyi snying ga rlung
T02D2839:180b-25: sems kyi ngo bo hr'i: gsal po bsil ba'i 'od
T02D2839:180b-26: zer can la shes pa gtad nas ji bzhin dgug
T02D2839:180b-27: ba'i sbyor bas gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2839:180b-28: de'i 'og tu rang gi nyer bsdogs kyi dngos po
T02D2839:180b-29: gang yin pa 'di dag nyid lha'i rnam par dag
T02D2839:180b-30: par dmigs // mngon par chags dang yongs su sdang //
T02D2839:180b-31: rab tu mi shes gzhi gsum gyi //
T02D2839:180b-32: dbang gis las gang mngon gyur gang //
T02D2839:180b-33: de 'dir mgon po gsum du mos //
T02D2839:180b-34: dbus su mthing ga rdo rje can //
T02D2839:180b-35: g-yas su dmar mdzes ral gri 'dzin //
T02D2839:180b-36: g-yon du dkar gsal zhags bsnams pa //
T02D2839:180b-37: thams cad g-yon du padmo mtshan //
T02D2839:180b-38: rgya chen pho brang lhar bcas pa //
T02D2839:180b-39: skad cig gis ni lha gsum 'dir //
T02D2839:180b-40: bsdus la rim pa ji bzhin du //
T02D2839:180b-42: gang phyir 'chi bar byed pa'i rgyu //
T02D2839:180b-43: nyon mongs gsum yin de yin rkyen //
T02D2839:180b-44: las phyir de yi mi ma than phyogs //
T02D2839:181a-3: sku dang de yi nyer bstan dang //
T02D2839:181a-4: bsam pa'i thugs rje che zhes pa //
T02D2839:181a-5: rnam gsum rim gyis bsgom par bya //
T02D2839:181a-7: snying gi bum pa chags sdang bcas //
T02D2839:181a-8: bcas shing de yi sbyor ba dang //
T02D2839:181a-9: yan lag rnam par gzhig pa'ang 'bad //
T02D2839:181a-11: ma lus 'chi ba bdag len dang //
T02D2839:181a-12: de dag 'chi ba bzlog nyid dang //
T02D2839:181a-13: sman mchog sbyor ba nyid dang ni //
T02D2839:181a-14: 'chi ba med dang brtse chen gyi //
T02D2839:181a-17: nus na dkyil 'khor chen po yi //
T02D2839:181a-18: sgrub pa'i cho ga ji bzhin du //
T02D2839:181a-19: mkhas pas 'bad de bsgrub par bya //
T02D2839:181a-20: ji srid 'chi bdag sgra gcan la //
T02D2839:181a-21: rnal 'byor tshe yi zla ba nya //
T02D2839:181a-22: grol 'gyur de tshe rmi lam du //
T02D2839:181a-24: de nas dga' ston tshogs bsags phyir //
T02D2839:181a-25: dpag med mchod pa'i rgya mtsho yis //
T02D2839:181a-26: phyi nang gsang dang yang dag gis //
T02D2839:181a-27: spyan ras gzigs dbang mchod par bya //
